entity.name: COVID-19: Here are the latest fact checks
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information from Indian organisations that are certified by Poynter Institute's International Fact-Checking Network (IFCN) to help understand whether information around the pandemic is credible and accurate.

text:
India Today News Director Rahul Kanwal claimed that President Trump suggested early access of coronavirus vaccine to India in his interview with Fox News. #AltNewsFactCheck could not find any such reference in the interview. | @samjawed65 

https://t.co/hSWOEZ1yfh
